title: The Lazarus Bowl
description: Based on the real story of Cardinal Augustine O’Fallon. The Lazarus Bowl follows the Cigarette Smoking Pontiff as he searches for the titular artifact in order to raise an army of zombies before FBI agents Fox Mulder and Dana Scully can stop him.
altHero: Garry Shandling as Mulder holding up a golden bowl
alt1: the pope grits his teeth while holding a woman hostage
alt2: Mulder hides behind a headstone while rifle lasers point at him
alt3: the pope holding a gun up to Scully
alt4: a close-up of a zombie’s face
